  2. Best Ai Website Builder Small Business

Tested for Real Small Businesses · Honest Comparison

Best AI Website Builder for Small Business

Small business owners need websites fast. Don't have time to learn code. Don't have budget for agencies. AI website builders promise instant sites. I tested them all. Here's what actually works.

Quick verdict: Durable.co for copy-first businesses. v0.dev for design-first businesses with dev skills. Framer for businesses needing CMS/blogging.

What Small Businesses Actually Need

  • • Fast to create — You're running a business, not building sites
  • • Professional looking — Customers judge credibility by design
  • • Easy to update — Prices, hours, photos change regularly
  • • Mobile optimized — Most customers browse on phones
  • • Affordable — Every dollar counts for small business

Best AI Website Builders by Category

Best Overall: Durable.co

Generates the best AI copy for small businesses. Your products, services, and value proposition come through clearly.

Price: Free tier (3 sites). Pro at $12/month.

Best Design: v0.dev

Creates the most beautiful AI-generated designs. Clean, modern, professional. Best for design-focused brands.

Price: Free tier (100 generations/mo). Pro at $20/month.

Best All-in-One: Framer

Complete website platform. Hosting included. CMS for blogging. Visual editing. Good for multi-page sites.

Price: Free tier (2 sites). Pro at $15/month.
